articles.content: Shares of HCL Technologies dipped 6% in Monday's early trade to a day's low of Rs 1,382 after the IT major reported a net profit of Rs 3,995 crore for the quarter ended March 31, 2024, which was marg… [+3049 chars]

articles.description: As for the Nifty, going ahead, immediate support is expected around last Thursday’s low of 22,300, which coincides with the 20EMA (20-day exponential moving average), followed by the pivotal support of the bullish gap around 22,200.
